original_text: You have heard the message that I have taught. Many other people also heard it and they agree that it is true. Now you must tell the same message to other people who will be able to teach it to even more people. They should be people that you can trust as honest people and who can teach well. Timothy 1 Timothy 3
korean_text: 또 네가 많은 증인 앞에서 내게 들은 바를 충성된 사람들에게 부탁하라 그들이 또 다른 사람들을 가르칠 수 있으리라

sentences.original_text: Many other people also heard it
and they agree that it is true
Now you must tell the same message
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 당신은 동일한 메시지를 전해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: who will be able to teach it
that you can trust as honest people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 정직한 사람으로 신뢰할 수 있는
그리고 잘 가르칠 수 있는 사람
